module: Module-level comment: The clk_divider module generates a lower frequency output 'CLOCK_1_HZ' from a high-frequency input 'main_clock'. It uses a counter 'divide_counter' to toggle 'slow_clock' upon reaching a preset threshold, determined by 'divide'. This toggling output, derived from changes in 'slow_clock', effectively divides the input frequency to produce 'CLOCK_1_HZ'.
